properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Advisory issued January 29 at 3:16PM EST until January 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt
with a few gusts up to 35 kt. For the Freezing Spray Advisory,
moderate accumulation of freezing spray expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME
out 25 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST Thursday.
For the Freezing Spray Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10
AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY... ...FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
